argument.name: EncodedString
argument.description: A base 64 encoded version of the binary data.

page.description: Encode (to string) binary data using BASE64.
page.discussion: BASE64ENCODE() returns a string in base-64 format encoded from binary data of arbitrary length. Because the data is now represented by the ASCII character set, it is suitable for transmission as text in email.
page.example: dim fp as P dim blob as B fp = file.open("c:\databases\functions\ahv2.jpg", FILE_RO_SHARED) blob = fp.readb(1000) fp.close() base64encode(blob) -> " /9j/4AAQSkZJRgABAQEASwBLAAD/2wBDAAMCAgMCAgMDAwMEAwMEBQgFBQQEBQo HBwYIDAoMDAsKCwsNDhIQDQ4RDgsLEBYQERMUFRUVDA8XGBYUGBIUFRT/2wBDAQMEBAUEBQ ......."
